Stephanie Csanky

Hello!

Originally from Toronto, but growing up in a small town, I have experienced art in many different forms and from a young age I have been both intrigued and inspired by the arts. I spent many hours doing arts and crafts, painting, drawing and writing. This created a passion for creating art, which led me to enroll in post-secondary studies at Algonquin College for a Diploma in Graphic Design. I am currently in my third year of studies..

Throughout the three year program, I have gained plenty of experience both with digital and physical art which has allowed me to create an extensive and versatile portfolio. My specialities are in web design, branding, typography and layout.

Portfolio

I’m constantly creating design work for both myself as personal projects and others, as a current Graphic Design student. Here’s a few of my most recent works along with a link to all of my public portfolio pieces.
